sentences.sContent: The merit of the report is its realistic assessment of the changes required.

sentences.sContent: The great merit of the project is its flexibility and low cost.
sentences.sCn: 该项目最大的优点是它的灵活性和低成本。

sentences.sContent: Each of these approaches to teaching has its merits .
sentences.sCn: 这些教学方法每一种都有其优点。

sentences.sContent: Tonight’s meeting will weigh up the relative merits of the two candidates.
sentences.sCn: 今晚的会议将对两位候选人的相对优点进行考量。

sentences.sContent: It’s a fascinating book which merits attention.
sentences.sCn: 这是本引人入胜的书，值得关注。
